ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank members of the Boyer Lab who assisted with specimen collection and provided helpful feedback on the project, either as full‐time researchers in Summer 2016 or through enrollment in the Fall 2016 iteration of Biology 476: Research Biodiversity and Evolution (Raine Ikagawa, Dan Klonowski, Eva Larsen, Alex Lewanski, and Maddy Olson). Kasey Fowler‐Finn (St. Louis University) collected and shared specimens from Missouri. Mike Anderson (Macalester College) assisted with statistical analyses and provided helpful feedback on the project. Peter Tiffin and two anonymous reviewers provided helpful feedback that improved the manuscript.
